name: Teamcity XSL Transformation Runner
tagline: A Teamcity plugin for XSL Transformations
body:
This is forked from the [Unity Runner](https://github.com/mindcandy/Teamcity-unity3d-build-runner-plugin).
It simply runs XSLT Transforms using msxsl.exe, bundled with the code.

Here is the latest [zip](https://docs.google.com/uc?id=0B0QNAIrRLSqVVzl6cjJkWS1ReFU&export=download). Place it in the plugins directory of teamcity and restart the server.

![xslt runner](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/Cmp-LMAMeJQWkLlHwKXv341vOiM0MPXx0E4GQ_t-mkSe74AWewngMcUpgHgnBtYYry8H5szecqg=w1896-h792)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
